Strings.is the way you would \u0027say\u0027 the: is the way you would "say" the digit string from
Strings.Out of range: Entered value was out of range of expected values
Strings.The count-and-say sequence is a sequence: The count-and-say sequence is a sequence of digit strings defined by the recursive formula
Strings.Then for each group, say: Then for each group, say the number of characters, then say the character.
Strings.To convert the saying: To convert the saying into a digit string, replace the counts with a number and concatenate every saying.
Strings.To determine how you: To determine how you "say" a digit string, split it into the minimal number of groups so that each group is a contiguous section all of the same character.
Strings.which is then converted into a different: which is then converted into a different digit string
Strings.You can use the url: You can use the URL from the address bar to navigate to the page and move to the "Output" section.
